name: House of Three
description:
You find yourself faced with three doors.

After accepting an invitation to a New Year's Eve Party, you expect the normal things: staying up too late, one person getting a bit too drunk. But what you don't expect is to be snowed in, or for your fate to be changed the moment you walk in the door. 

Which door will you choose? What will you do?

Made for the Winter VN Game Jam.
